ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MSA_Effective_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(MSA_Expiration_Date__c)), MSA_Expiration_Date__c <= MSA_Effective_Date__c, MSA_Expiration_Date__c < TODAY() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Engagement_VR01: Please ensure the Expiration Date is after the Effective Date
